    • addBonus

      @RequestMapping(value="", method=POST) public Bonus addBonus​(@RequestParam("referralCode") java.lang.String referralCode, @RequestParam("extraFee") int extraFee, @RequestParam("minTotalFee") int minTotalFee, @RequestParam boolean active) throws ReferralCodeAlreadyExistsException
